errors.addressNotFound: FR Could not retrieve the blockchain address for sending funds. Apologies for any inconvenience.
errors.emailValid: FR Must be a valid email address
errors.emailsDoNotMatch: FR Email addresses do not match
errors.invalidName: FR Invalid first and last name
errors.failedPayment: FR Invalid payment details. Check your credit card and/or billing address details.
errors.minimumBid: FR Your bid must be at least {{amount}}
errors.bidLessThanHighestBid: FR Your bid was lower than the current high bid.
errors.maxCharacters: FR Must be less than {max} characters
errors.minCharacters: FR Must be at least {min} characters
errors.minUSDC: FR Found balance of {{balance}} {{currency}}, but the minimum needed is {{min}} {{currency}}
errors.maxItems: FR Must pick at most {max} items
errors.minImageFileSize: FR Image must be {{fileSize}} or smaller
errors.noUSDC: FR No USDC found in wallet
errors.onlyLettersAndNumbers: FR Must contain only letters and numbers
errors.onlyLowercaseLettersAndNumbers: FR Only lowercase characters and numbers allowed
errors.paymentNotCreated: FR The payment could not be created. Please contact support.
errors.transferDeclined: FR Transaction was declined, or something went wrong during payment.
errors.transferNotFound: FR Transfer not found. If this was completed, keep checking the status.

bankInstructions.label: FR Bank Wire Instructions
bankInstructions.helpText: FR Below is all of the information you need to initiate a wire transfer. Keep in mind, your bank may use slightly different names for these details. May the odds be ever in your favor.
bankInstructions.notice: FR You're not done! Once you submit your payment info, we will share the information you need to bring to your bank to initiate a wire transfer. Once you complete payment below, you will have 7 days to submit payment before your winning bid is canceled.

bid.confirmation: FR I understand that I need to complete payment within 72 hours or I will forfeit my winning bid.
bid.description: FR Your card will be charged immediately on auction close if you place the winning bid.
bid.label: FR Your Bid
bid.success: FR You're the current high bidder for {{title}}

defaultCard.label: FR Default
defaultCard.helpText: FR Make card my default for purchases

fullName.label: FR Full Name
fullName.helpText: FR As it appears on your card

description.1: FR Your passphrase is used to approve every transaction.
description.2: FR It cannot be reset if lost.

passphrase.label: FR Passphrase
passphrase.enterPassphrase: FR Enter your passphrase to authorize this transaction.

card.label: FR Credit Card
card.helpText: FR Accepted for winning bids up to $3,000

wire.label: FR Bank Wire Transfer
wire.helpText: FR Accepted for all winning bids

crypto.label: FR Crypto Wallet
crypto.helpText: FR Accepted for all winning bids. Payment accepted in USDC from WalletConnect, MyAlgo, or Coinbase.

payWithCrypto.label: FR Pay with Crypto
payWithCrypto.helpText: FR We can only accept crypto payments in USDC-A.

tutorial.prompt: FR Don't have a Crypto Wallet yet?

instructions.label: FR If you already have a wallet
instructions.1: FR Click to connect and scan the QR code using your wallet's mobile app, OR copy the blockchain address to your clipboard.
instructions.2: FR Initiate the purchase, either by clicking the Purchase button or manually transferring funds to the copied address.
instructions.3: FR Submit your payment of {{price}} in USDC.
instructions.4: FR Check for payment. Once we receive your payment, you will be the new owner of the NFT.

createWallet.label: FR Create a Wallet
createWallet.link: FR Tutorial on creating a new account
createWallet.1: FR Install Algorand Wallet on your mobile device
createWallet.2: FR Create a new account with Algorand Wallet
createWallet.3: FR Add USDC by clicking Add new asset and searching for USDC

purchaseAlgos.label: FR Purchase ALGOs
purchaseAlgos.link: FR Tutorial on transferring cryptocurrency using Coinbase
purchaseAlgos.notice: FR Note: Fees are added during the swap
purchaseAlgos.1: FR Sign up for a Coinbase account
purchaseAlgos.3: FR Transfer ALGOs to your Algorand wallet

swapAlgos.label: FR Swap ALGOs for USDC-A
swapAlgos.notice: FR Beware of extra fees and slippage! Wallet needs to have enough to cover the item cost + fees.
swapAlgos.2: FR Select ALGOs as From and USDC as To

price.label: FR Price
price.disclaimer: Price is shown in {{currency}} but will settle in {{amount}} USDC

saveCard.label: FR Save my card for future purchases

username.helpText: FR How you'll appear to others
username.label: FR Username
